alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Palmdale to 8 miles northeast of Felda to near Devils Garden. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Labelle, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Montura, Palmdale, Port La Belle, Devils Garden, Ortona, Harlem, Keri and Lake Hicpochee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
